metadata.title: CVE-2024-26949 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/pm: Fix NULL pointer dereference when get power limit Becausepowerplay_table initialization is skipped under sriov case, We check andset default lower and upper OD value if powerplay_table is NULL.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
